testcase.name: Fetch valid user - GET call.
testcase.system-out: * url baseUrl...............................................................passed * def header_Data = { Content-Type: "application/json", Accept: "application/json"}.passed Given path 'users'..........................................................passed When method get.............................................................passed Then status 200.............................................................passed And match header Content-Type contains 'application/json'...................passed And match header Connection == 'keep-alive'.................................passed And match header Cache-Control contains 'public'............................passed * def first = response[0]...................................................passed Given path 'users', first.id................................................passed When method get.............................................................passed Then status 200.............................................................passed And assert responseStatus == 200 || responseStatus == 204...................passed * print "response : ", response.............................................passed * print "user id from response : ", response.id.............................passed * def result = response.....................................................passed * print "result : " ,result.id.............................................passed * print "result.name : ", result.name.......................................passed * print "result.username : ", result.username...............................passed * print "result.email : ", result.email.....................................passed * print "result.phone : ", result.phone.....................................passed * print "result.website : ", result.website.................................passed Then match result.name == '#string'........................................passed And match result.username == '#string'.....................................passed And match response.id == '#number'..........................................passed And match response.phone == '#regex [0-9].*-[0-9]*-[0-9]*-[0-9]* x[0-9]*'...passed * def userEmail = {email: '#(result.email)' }...............................passed * print "email : ", userEmail...............................................passed And match userEmail == { email : '#regex [a-zA-Z].*@[a-zA-Z].[a-z].*' }.....passed
